QuestData.Title: The End is Now
QuestData.Description:
Our forces have control of the House of Constructs, thanks to your intervention.
Now, all that remains is to vanquish their treacherous leader--Margrave Gharmal.
This battle has been long in the making, $p. I am at your side without hesitation.
Let us confront this monster. We will join Xandria to see Gharmal slain.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Xandria near the central chamber of the House of Constructs.
